function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"KT platform not providing trustworthy evidence during the pandemic","Impact":"Misinformation and lack of guidance for policy-makers, stakeholders, citizens, and media, leading to ineffective decision-making.","Mitigation":"Establish rigorous fact-checking processes and ensure transparency in evidence and recommendations. Engage with independent experts and academic institutions to validate information.","Technologies":"Data analytics and machine learning for evidence synthesis and validation.","People":"Policy-makers, stakeholders, citizens, media","Owner":"KT platform administrators, academic institutions, independent experts"},{"Description":"Failure to educate and raise awareness in vulnerable groups about COVID-19","Impact":"Increased spread of the virus among vulnerable populations, higher risk of severe illness and mortality.","Mitigation":"Targeted outreach and education programs for vulnerable groups, leveraging community leaders, local healthcare providers, and social media influencers for dissemination.","Technologies":"Telemedicine for remote health education, AI-powered chatbots for addressing misconceptions and providing guidance.","People":"Vulnerable groups, citizens, media","Owner":"KT platform administrators, healthcare providers, community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of responsiveness to changing priorities and needs","Impact":"Ineffective allocation of resources, failure to address emerging issues, and inability to provide timely guidance during evolving situations.","Mitigation":"Establish dynamic feedback mechanisms for gathering information on changing priorities and needs. Utilize agile project management methodologies to adapt quickly to new challenges.","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms for real-time communication and information sharing, data visualization tools for tracking evolving trends.","People":"Policy-makers, stakeholders, citizens, media","Owner":"KT platform administrators, project managers"}]}
